comments.text:
After I pushed bug 634155, Igor pushed a shell breakage fix (https://hg.mozilla.org/tracemonkey/rev/ebb7eb076e89). Since my bug passed tinderbox, this implies we're not building this during continuous integration.

What's the configure line to get perf/pm_linux.cpp built? I couldn't see it when running |./configure --help|.
comments.creator: paul.biggar@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
After I pushed bug 634155, Igor pushed a shell breakage fix (https://hg.mozilla.org/tracemonkey/rev/ebb7eb076e89). Since my bug passed tinderbox, this implies we're not building this during continuous integration.

What's the configure line to get perf/pm_linux.cpp built? I couldn't see it when running |./configure --help|.
comments.author: paul.biggar@gmail.com

comments.text: Ah, so this runs automatically if you have linux/perf_event.h installed. If we install this on tinderbox, are we going to install this in our full build? Not sure where to go with this one.
comments.raw_text: Ah, so this runs automatically if you have linux/perf_event.h installed. If we install this on tinderbox, are we going to install this in our full build? Not sure where to go with this one.
comments.creator: paul.biggar@gmail.com
comments.author: paul.biggar@gmail.com
